references.paper_title: Phi-3 technical report: A highly capable language model locally on your phone
references.reason: This paper introduces a highly capable language model, relevant to the study of MLLMs and their capabilities.

references.paper_title: nocaps: novel object captioning at scale
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel object captioning dataset, which is crucial for the evaluation of multimodal models.
This paper provides a technical report on the Qwen model, a significant multimodal large language model.
This foundational paper establishes the concept of few-shot learning for language models, which is highly relevant to the field of multimodal LLMs.
This paper details another important multimodal large language model, contributing to the discussion of MLLMs and their training.
